message.body: Tumblr etiquette help...if someone "asks" that they think you're cool (in a platonic way), do you answer "thanks i think youre cool (platonically) too" privately or publicly? Also I'm excited I might get to see you this weekend! :)
Whichever is fine. If you want it to show up on your blog, do it publicly. If it doesn't feel right there, private is fine.
I decided it would be weirder to answer it privately
I'm excited to see you too!
